mutants.code:
def compute_roi(period, assets, expenses):
    revenue = sum([r for (r, p) in period])
    expenses_period = sum([p for (r, p) in period])
    profit = revenue + expenses_period
    if assets == 0:
        return 0
    roi = (profit - expenses) / assets
    return roi

def compute_roi(period, assets, expenses):
    revenue = sum([r for (r, p) in period])
    expenses_period = sum([p for (r, p) in period])
    profit = revenue * expenses_period
    if assets == 0:
        return 0
    roi = (profit - expenses) / assets
    return roi

def compute_roi(period, assets, expenses):
    revenue = sum([r for (r, p) in period])
    expenses_period = sum([p for (r, p) in period])
    profit = revenue - expenses_period
    if assets != 0:
        return 0
    roi = (profit - expenses) / assets
    return roi

def compute_roi(period, assets, expenses):
    revenue = sum([r for (r, p) in period])
    expenses_period = sum([p for (r, p) in period])
    profit = revenue - expenses_period
    if assets == 0:
        return 0
    roi = (profit - expenses) * assets
    return roi

def compute_roi(period, assets, expenses):
    revenue = sum([r for (r, p) in period])
    expenses_period = sum([p for (r, p) in period])
    profit = revenue - expenses_period
    if assets == 0:
        return 0
    roi = (profit - expenses) // assets
    return roi

def compute_roi(period, assets, expenses):
    revenue = sum([r for (r, p) in period])
    expenses_period = sum([p for (r, p) in period])
    profit = revenue - expenses_period
    if assets == 1:
        return 0
    roi = (profit - expenses) / assets
    return roi

def compute_roi(period, assets, expenses):
    revenue = sum([r for (r, p) in period])
    expenses_period = sum([p for (r, p) in period])
    profit = revenue - expenses_period
    if assets == -1:
        return 0
    roi = (profit - expenses) / assets
    return roi

def compute_roi(period, assets, expenses):
    revenue = sum([r for (r, p) in period])
    expenses_period = sum([p for (r, p) in period])
    profit = revenue - expenses_period
    if assets == 1:
        return 0
    roi = (profit - expenses) / assets
    return roi

def compute_roi(period, assets, expenses):
    revenue = sum([r for (r, p) in period])
    expenses_period = sum([p for (r, p) in period])
    profit = revenue - expenses_period
    if assets == 0:
        return 1
    roi = (profit - expenses) / assets
    return roi

def compute_roi(period, assets, expenses):
    revenue = sum([r for (r, p) in period])
    expenses_period = sum([p for (r, p) in period])
    profit = revenue - expenses_period
    if assets == 0:
        return -1
    roi = (profit - expenses) / assets
    return roi

def compute_roi(period, assets, expenses):
    revenue = sum([r for (r, p) in period])
    expenses_period = sum([p for (r, p) in period])
    profit = revenue - expenses_period
    if assets == 0:
        return 1
    roi = (profit - expenses) / assets
    return roi

def compute_roi(period, assets, expenses):
    revenue = sum([r for (r, p) in period])
    expenses_period = sum([p for (r, p) in period])
    profit = revenue - expenses_period
    if assets == 0:
        return 0
    roi = (profit + expenses) / assets
    return roi

def compute_roi(period, assets, expenses):
    revenue = sum([r for (r, p) in period])
    expenses_period = sum([p for (r, p) in period])
    profit = revenue - expenses_period
    if assets == 0:
        return 0
    roi = profit * expenses / assets
    return roi
